column4: ok.. this is odd, how do I get into the live session? I downloaded and burned Ubuntu 11.04 64-bit to a CD, but there is no "try ubuntu" option. is that new/normal?
when you installed, did you actually install from from a live session? or did you use the "install inside windows" option?
neither, I choose "Install Ubuntu" from the CD
so. (again, just to be clear).. you inserted the CD.. and rebooted, let the CD boot, and got a option to "install ubuntu"
